## Install packages

Installing the packages used.

```{r r_packages, message = FALSE, output=FALSE}
# Required packages
if (!require(pacman))
  install.packages("pacman")

pacman::p_load(tidymodels,
               tidyverse,
               ranger,
               randomForest,
               glmnet,
               gridExtra)

# Global ggplot theme
theme_set(theme_bw() + theme(legend.position = "top"))
```
